original_text: They have caused other people to have much trouble. In return, God will cause them to have trouble. They just do things which will make their bodies happy. They have wild parties, even during the day. They eat and drink too much when they eat meals with you. They enjoy all these bad ways to be happy. As a result, people think bad things about you as well. They cause people to be ashamed about you. So they are like dirty marks that spoil something which is clean.
korean_text: 불의의 값으로 불의를 당하며 낮에 즐기고 노는 것을 기쁘게 여기는 자들이니 점과 흠이라 너희와 함께 연회할 때에 그들의 속임수로 즐기고 놀며

sentences.original_text: They have caused other people to have much trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들에게 많은 고통을 주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: In return, God will cause them to have trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 대신, 하나님은 그들이 고통을 받게 하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They just do things which will make their bodies happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기들의 몸을 기쁘게 할 일들만 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They have wild parties, even during the day.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 낮 동안에도 거친 파티를 엽니다.

sentences.original_text: They eat and drink too much when they eat meals with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신들과 식사할 때 너무 많이 먹고 마십니다.

sentences.original_text: They enjoy all these bad ways to be happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 기쁘게 되기 위한 이 모든 나쁜 방법들을 즐깁니다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, people think bad things about you as well.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 사람들도 당신들에 대해 나쁜 생각을 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They cause people to be ashamed about you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들이 당신들에 대해 수치스러워하게 만듭니다.

sentences.original_text: So they are like dirty marks that spoil something which is clean.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 깨끗한 것을 더럽히는 얼룩과 같습니다.
